name: Lyzia
overview:
Lyzia BV provides DRM solutions for the entertainment sector. It offers No Point! product for the purpose of selling a single music track through a sales avenue where a download shop has not been setup; White Label e-commerce Shop that enables its partners to sell music downloads without having to develop their own system; and Integrated Entertainment Solution, which enables clients to integrate a download shop into their exciting Website. The company also offers Secure Audio Streams solution, a technique, which allows clients to protect there Internet audio/video streams; Packager Solution that digitize and package the tracks from a CD into a digital format along with the appropriate meta data; and Online DRM that enables clients to register a service through a Web interface. In addition, Lyzia provides Live DRM, which enables customers to connect their Media Encoder to the Live DRM module; Unique Code that enables consumers to use a code instead of money to download one, or more tracks at Websites.

The company is based in The Hague, the Netherlands. Lyzia BV operates as a subsidiary of Commodore International BV.
